content: I created https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/57 to host updates and interesting information
There is a draft RFC on the lang-team repository
I hope y'all are still motivated to work on this, apologies for the long delays

I'm still motivated to work on this, although for personal reasons I might not get around to much in the next few weeks.

So far I have been playing with my earlier prototype to extend it to support ${count(ident)} syntax. It looks doable, although I'll probably need some help further down the road to turn it into production-ready code as it'll be more involved to parse the block contents.

Once I have that working I'll rework my original draft RFC based on the feedback so far.
@Mark Thomas great! sounds good.
